ygData.subject: Re: A pred inside Maxi's base (Kitkat)
ygData.msgSnippet: KitKat:: She stood up and looked at BlackFang. Yes, I remember you. What is going on here? Ancient ones coming back and maximals, predacons and decepticons

KitKat::

She stood up and looked at BlackFang. "Yes, I remember you. What is 
going on here? Ancient ones coming back and maximals, predacons and 
decepticons working together? Did the whole world go crazy while the 
matrix had it's fun? All the preds I knew are destroyed. I am the 
last of my group. My life as I knew it is over. What is to happen 
now? Do I get reprogrammed again like they tried that one time? 
Predacons are predacon in nature and program. No matter how many 
times you try to reprogram a pred into a maximal, it won't work. You 
just get what I am, one ver confused bot. But I am still Pred. Always 
will be."
She did put her hand on his shoulder."But you know, your still a bot 
worth remembering. Even to a hard sparked pred like me." she smiled 
at him with a warm and almost caring smile. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang arrived and decided it was best to take thing on himself -
 
> not that he didn't trust Shadowcaster, but he did find his ways a 
> bit drastic.
> 
> Blackfang: Thanks Shade, and you too, guys (he nods at Windlord and 
> Kup). If you allow, I can take care of her.
> 
> He then looks at KitKat. She did not seem okay, at least not in her 
> processors, and he felt pity towards her. He looks in her eyes.
> 
> Blackfang: Hello KitKat... Do you remember me?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > When he saw she'd calmed down, he places her gently on
> > the floor. Never fails he thought. Chuckling at the
> > situation, he decided to let her in on a secret.
> > 
> > "Nothing like a Decepticon to knock some snse into a
> > Preadcon- by the way, did you ever consider that maybe
> > it's you who hates the matrix?"
> > 
> >  --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> > wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She was too startled to make sence of this huge bot
> > who just picked 
> > her up.  She transformed into wolf mode and started
> > scrambling to get 
> > out of his arms. "LET ME GO! I KNEW YOU WOULD TRY TO
> > TORTURE ME! "  
> > SHe struggled and squirmed trying to get out of his
> > grip. "MAXIMALS 
> > ARE AS TRETCHEROUS AS PREDACONS!"  She struggled hard,
> > but his grip 
> > was firm.  She stopped as she felt her body reach low
> > energy levels. 
> > She looked up at him as she lay in his arms, "Go
> > ahead, kill me. Send 
> > me to the pit for all I care. I'll just come back
> > again. The matrix 
> > hates me. So I shall never know peace." She was still
> > in wolf mode 
> > and taking deep breaths. She almost felt like crying,
> > but a warrior 
> > can never show true emotion or they show they are
> > weak. She wimpered 
> > once and then stopped. She lay still and waited for
> > the bot to crush 
> > her.  
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > Shadowcaster couldn't believe how childish everyone
> > > was acting- even beginning to wonder just how Primus
> > > could have been so patient with his children when
> > they
> > > clearly needed to grow up. He grabs Kitkat with
> > > lightning speed in him hand (he's the size of
> > Optimal
> > > Optimus) and stares her down, making it clear that
> > > enough is enough.
> > > 
> > > "I SAID THAT'S ENOUGH! UNICRON IS ABOUT TO COMMIT
> > > MASSIVE TEMPORAL BUTCHERING IN THIS TIME AND YOU'RE
> > > BUSY PURSUING CHILDISH GRUDGES! I WONT SAY STAND
> > DOWN
> > > AGAIN!!!"
> > > 
> > > The look in his eyes said to drop it if she valued
> > her
> > > functionality.
> > > 
> > >  --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> > > wrote: 
> > > ---------------------------------
> > > KitKat::
> > > 
> > > SHe looked at Kup and let her memory chip remind her
> > > where she had 
> > > met this bot before. He knew her but she couldn't
> > > remember why. Yet 
> > > he seemed familiar to her somehow. "Listen, first
> > off,
> > > I wasn't in 
> > > your territory. Second, maximals and preds would
> > never
> > > have an 
> > > allience. Third, if you do have such an allience,
> > then
> > > you'd release 
> > > me instead of just thinking about lettimg me go. And
> > > another thing..."
> > > She transformed into bot mode. Her sleek and matt
> > > black finish was 
> > > flawless. Her form was near perfect. Her wolf tail
> > was
> > > still behind 
> > > her, swishing and wagging as she stood up with her
> > > elegent hands on 
> > > her well formed hips. She looked at Kup, "And
> > another
> > > thing, why save 
> > > me if I'm a pred and your a maximal? Even if we have
> > > an allience, we 
> > > are still and will always be eternal enemies. So
> > > fixing me up does't 
> > > make sence."  She thought about it some more.
> > "Unless
> > > we have a 
> > > common enemy that is so great we need every bot we
> > > have."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000"
> > > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Windlord/Kup:::
> > > > 
> > > > "What're you talking about, you...?"answer back

> > > >

> > Kitkat,
> > > we should 
> > > clear 
> > > > this... First of all, Kitkat, you're not a POW
> > > 'cause we are not in 
> > > > a conflict with preds, we have a temporal alliance
> > > with Preds; 
> > > > Second, According with some reports caught by our
> > > sencors, you was 
> > > > found wounded and almost in stasis in our
> > territory,
> > > so the most 
> > > > natural thing is that we bring you to CR in order
> > to
> > > get do a 
> > > > reseach why are you in our territory; Third, is
> > > Rodimus who will 
> > > > decide what we should do with you: Realease you or
> > > not. Now Kitkat 
> > > I 
> > > > would like that you explain me why are you in our
> > > territory and why 
> > > > was you wounded? "
